name: Core_Assets_ImageOperations_MirrorHorizontal
description: An image operation. Mirrors the image horizontally.
Let \(w \geq 0\) and \(h \geq 0\) be the width of the height of the image, respectively,
then the pixel at \((x,y)\) with \(x \in [1,w]\) and \(y \in [1,h]\) is swapped with the pixel at \((w-x,y)\).
